垻字的基本解释

垻
bà
同“坝”。

垻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bà］
［《廣韻》必駕切，去禡，幫。］
(1)平川。
(2)以称平坦的地方。
(3)同“壩”。拦截水流的建筑物。

垻字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　垻； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页229第10
【集韻】博蓋切，音貝。障水堰也。今人謂堰埭曰垻。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?必駕切，音霸。蜀人謂平川曰垻。【黃庭堅詩】君家冰茄白銀色，殊勝垻裏紫彭亨。　一作灞䃻。

垻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
垻字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bà］
["Guangyun" must be cut, go to the 禡, help. ]
(1) Pingchuan.
(2) It is called a flat place.
(3) Same as "dam". A building that intercepts the flow of water.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　垻; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 229 No. 10
[Jiyun] Bogeqie, Yinbei. Barrier water weir also. Nowadays, people say Yandai is called Yan.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Must drive and cut, Yinba. The people of Shu called Pingchuan and said 垻. 【Huang Tingjian's poems】The Junjia ice eggplant is white and silver, and it is superior to the purple Pahang in Yinli.　一作灞䃻.
